ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description: Python library for reading FT-IR imaging datasets created by Resolutions Pro on Agilent Cary instruments with FPA area detectors. Developed for use in the orange-spectroscopy add-in, which is part of the Quasar data analysis program.
about.summary: File reader for Agilent Resolutions Pro FT-IR images

about.description: Python library for reading FT-IR imaging datasets created by Resolutions Pro on Agilent Cary instruments with FPA area detectors. Developed for use in the orange-spectroscopy add-in, which is part of the Quasar data analysis program.
about.summary: File reader for Agilent Resolutions Pro FT-IR images

name: agilent-format
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "agilent-format" %}
{% set version = "0.4.7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 938546a57d4be4ab41737ca617bd7d8edb8cb4c38e067aa74a14fd590ac186e9

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=61.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy

test:
  imports:
    - agilent_format
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  summary: File reader for Agilent Resolutions Pro FT-IR images
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  home: https://github.com/stuart-cls/python-agilent-file-formats
  description: Python library for reading FT-IR imaging datasets created by Resolutions Pro on Agilent Cary instruments with FPA area detectors. Developed for use in the orange-spectroscopy add-in, which is part of the Quasar data analysis program.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - HeavyTony2
